p: Under the supervision of the traditional healers, plant specimens were collected in order to produce voucher specimens and deposit in the herbarium. These were prepared and preserved in 70% alcohol moistened newspapers (wet conservation), and transported to the Eduardo Mondlane University LMU Herbarium, in Maputo, where they were dried, deposited and scientifically identified by using dichotomic keys and herborized plant samples for comparisons. This study was conducted under the Master's research project from Leonardo Manuel.
